overview: Romi Rain is fed up with Tommy Pistol stalking her around the office. There's only one way to solve it...by fucking him in her office. Ava Dalush can't afford the contractor's fee (John Strong) so she offers him her body. Karlie Montana loves the way Bill Bailey handles the customer's calls, that southern charm of his turns her on and she makes the moves on Bill. Nadia Styles is a new employee at a toy shop and her boss (Will Powers) is explaining some of the products. Nadia picks one out for herself and she fucks the boss.
title: Bangin' The Boss 3
